Trigger You are about to Cast a Spell that affects a single target or an area.

As you arrange your lights, smoke and mirrors, you use special reflective catalysts to create a spotlight or to darken an area and draw attention where you want. Your spell provides magical light or darkness to arrange the stage for greater, dramatic effect.

Your catalyzed spell causes the center of the targeted area, a single creature in your spellâ€™s area or yourself to be covered in your choice of a 10-foot burst of bright light or darkness for 1 round. The spell gains the light or darkness trait, and can counteract magical darkness or magical light respectively, with a counteract rank equal to the spell you cast.

Empowered Catalyst: Creatures of your choice can be unaffected by the light or darkness you cast.
